entry.title: Corsinvest/cv4pve-admin
entry.summary:
Corsinvest for Proxmox VE Web Admin Clusters

CV4PVE-ADMIN

[!WARNING] Technical support is considered valid only if each node of the cluster is covered by the cv4pve-admin license.

üíª What is it?

The easiest and most effective solution to monitor your multiple Proxmox VE cluster in a single web portal.

üöÄ Main features

Discover all the features on the official website: here

  • Completely written in C#
  • Use native Api REST Proxmox VE (library C#)
  • Independent os (Windows, Linux, Macosx)
  • Installation rapid, unzip file extract
  • Docker version DockerHub
  • Not require installation in Proxmox VE
  • Use Credential or Api Token to connect Cluster/Node
  • Execute outside Proxmox VE
  • Multiple Cluster/Node Management
  • Minimum version of Proxmox VE 6.4

‚¨áÔ∏è How to install

Immerse yourself in the world of comfort, follow these steps to download and install cv4pve-admin.

You can download cv4pve-admin in two ways: binary (via github) and docker (via dockerhub)

  • Binary Mode Steps
  • Docker Mode Steps

üìô Documentation

Documentation

üü¢ Access to the Web App

url: http://ipaddress:5000

username: admin@local password: Password123!

üåü We grow together

We really appreciate the stars, they help us grow. Thank you!
